title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 21.14 - Existing installations of approved anchors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 21.14 - Existing installations of approved anchors

State Regulations

No provision of this Part as amended effective February 25, 1964, requires or is intended to require alteration of any such installation
existing on that date which complies with former Industrial Code Rule No. 21 as
the same was in effect when the installation was made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
21.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
